front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for Service Location Protocol (SLP MIB)

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community.In particular, it defines as set of managed objects that supportmonitoring (but not configuration) of Service Location ProtocolVersion 2 (SLPv2, RFC 2608, RFC 3111, RFC 3224) directory agents(DAs), service agents (SAs), and user agents (UAs).
